sentences.en: A conservatory offers the perfect excuse to let your imagination run riot.
sentences.cn: 音乐学院让你有充分的理由任想象力自由驰骋。

sentences.en: About a thousand students fought with riot police in the capital.
sentences.cn: 大约1,000名学生在首都与防暴警察发生了冲突。

sentences.en: After about 10 minutes the riot police arrived.
sentences.cn: 大约10分钟之后，防暴警察就到了。

sentences.en: His murder triggered vicious race riots (= caused by a problem between different races ) .
sentences.cn: 他的被杀引发了严重的种族骚乱。

sentences.en: Officials say they'll spare no expense to prevent another riot.
sentences.cn: 官员说他们会不惜一切地阻止再次发生暴乱。

sentences.en: police in bullet-proof vests and carrying riot shields
sentences.cn: 穿防弹背心、持防暴盾牌的警察

sentences.en: Police in riot gear baton-charged the crowd.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中，警察挥舞着警棍对人群发起冲击。

sentences.en: police wearing riot gear
sentences.cn: 配有防暴装备的警察

sentences.en: Police with riot gear and several fire engines are in attendance.
sentences.cn: 防暴警察和数辆消防车都到了。

sentences.en: prison riots
sentences.cn: 监狱暴乱

sentences.en: Rampaging prisoners ran riot through Strangeways jail.
sentences.cn: 斯特兰韦斯监狱里那些狂暴的囚犯们全都失去了控制。

sentences.en: Ranks of police in riot gear stood nervously by.
sentences.cn: 一队队防暴警察紧张待命。

sentences.en: Riot police are being deployed throughout the city to prevent any trouble.
sentences.cn: 正在全城部署防暴警察以防止发生骚乱。

sentences.en: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.cn: 防暴警察向人群中投掷了催泪瓦斯罐和烟幕弹。

sentences.en: Riot vans were on the scene in minutes.
sentences.cn: 防暴车几分钟就赶到了现场。

sentences.en: The police were able to take preventive action and avoid a possible riot.
sentences.cn: 警方及时采取防范措施，避免了可能发生的骚乱。

sentences.en: The riot left four people dead and several dozen injured.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中四人丧生，数十人受伤。

sentences.en: They hurled defiant taunts at the riot police, who responded in kind.
sentences.cn: 他们向防暴警察挑衅大骂，防暴警察同样回骂他们。

sentences.en: Twelve inmates have been killed during a riot at the prison.
sentences.cn: 12名犯人在一场监狱暴乱中被杀害。

sentences.en: University students rioted in protest at tuition fees.
sentences.cn: 大学生闹事，抗议学费过高。

sentences.en: urban riots
sentences.cn: 城市骚乱

words.tran_cn: 暴乱的；狂欢的；不受约束的；放荡的；茂盛的

trans.tran_cn: 骚乱，暴动，暴乱，骚动，混乱，放荡，闹饮，嘈闹的宴会，喝酒狂闹，五色缤纷，喧嚣嘈杂，（想像，感情等的）奔放
trans.tran_en: a situation in which a large crowd of people are behaving in a violent and uncontrolled way, especially when they are protesting about something
(of a crowd of people) to behave in a violent way in a public place, often as a protest
if a crowd of people riot, they behave in a violent and uncontrolled way, for example by fighting the police and damaging cars or buildings
